name: sliced in sauce
title: Gourmet Mon Petit · sliced in sauce · beef, veal, lamb
description: Gourmet sliced in sauce beef, veal, lamb

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

usageInformation.usage: Feed your adult cat (4kg) up to 4 sachets per day, which should be divided between at least 2 meals.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: Just like you, your little gourmet loves a change. Therefore, allow your cat the pleasure of enjoying various delicacies during the day. GOURMET Mon Petit offers a selection of exquisite GOURMET recipes, specially developed to pamper your velvet paw with a wide variety of flavors, in the right portions for you: fine strips of meat or fish, cooked in a delicate sauce - an irresistible pleasure every time. Prepared with passion by GOURMET, the new GOURMET Mon Petit is offered in small 50-g bags, so that each meal can be served fresh and consumed at once.  GOURMET Mon Petit ... a variety of delicious meals in just the right size.

otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey  / www.purina.ch

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

mainSpecificities.value: Füttern Sie Ihrer ausgewachsenen Katze (4kg) im Laufe des Tages 6 bis 7 Portionsbeutel pro Tag,  die auf mindestens 2 Mahlzeiten verteilt werden sollten. Diese Richtwerte basieren auf mässig aktiven Katzen bei normaler Umgebungstemperatur. Individuelle Bedürfnisse können variieren,  sodass die Futtermenge entsprechend angepasst werden sollte,  um ein schlankes,  gesundes Körpergewicht Ihrer Katze zu erhalten. Bitte zimmerwarm servieren. Sauberes,  frisches Wasser sollte stets zur Verfügung stehen.

mainSpecificities.code: Food needs per day in bowls
